en_text: And who actually is his father?
jp_text: それ以前に ２期はあるのか
google_translated: Is there a second term before that?

en_text: People say cats show no appreciation, but we do have great memories.
jp_text: 猫は恩知らずって 言われがちだけど

en_text: We'll never forget all the good deeds you've done for us.
jp_text: 皆さんへの　ご恩は 決して忘れやせん
google_translated: I will never forget your help

en_text: I hope to see you again someday!
jp_text: んじゃまた　いつの日か
